import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { FirebaseContext } from '../../store/Context' import Heart from '../../assets/Heart'; import './Post.css'; import { getFirestore ,doc, getDoc} from 'firebase/firestore' function Posts() { const {firebaseApp}=useContext(FirebaseContext) const [Products, setProducts] = useContext([]) const fireStore=getFirestore(firebaseApp) useEffect(async()=>{ const docRef = doc(fireStore,'products'); const docSnap = await getDoc(docRef).then(()=>{ const allPost= docSnap.data().map(product=>{ return{ ...pr } }) }) },[]) return (
